html: Yesterday I had the chance to highlight the impact climate change is having on my constituents. Rising sea levels and stronger storms have caused coastal erosion in beach towns like San Clemente and Dana Point. This crisis is real. We must #ActOnClimate now.pic.twitter.com/I19KeZBarO
text:
Yesterday I had the chance to highlight the impact climate change is having on my constituents.

html: Today, Members of Congress were supposed to be on their way to visit U.S. troops overseas. Instead, @realDonaldTrump attempted to cancel the trip & then leaked commercial travel plans, putting their lives at risk. His temper tantrum is making us less safe, and it needs to end.
text:
Today, Members of Congress were supposed to be on their way to visit U.S. troops overseas. Instead, @realDonaldTrump attempted to cancel the trip & then leaked commercial travel plans, putting their lives at risk. 
 
His temper tantrum is making us less safe, and it needs to end.
